name: Crash Impact
description:
Crash impact, is a space platform game. Every level is unique as the level is built up at runtime procedurally with various parameters affecting it. Each level is more difficult than the previous one.

GAME FEATURES:

Infinite procedural levels that increase in difficulty.
Two game modes (normal and survival).
Seed functionality.
Minimalist graphics.
Different types of enemies and platforms.
Space exploration themed music
